Uses of Interface
net.targetr.httpd.HttpRequestHandler

  • Packages that use HttpRequestHandler 
    Package Description
    net.targetr.httpd
    Classes for running a simple HTTP server and serving resources.
    net.targetr.httpd.handler
    Classes for handling HTTP requests.
    net.targetr.photoframe.handler
    Classes for handling HTTP requests from web player and admin interface.

    • Uses of HttpRequestHandler in net.targetr.httpd

      Constructors in net.targetr.httpd with parameters of type HttpRequestHandler 
      Constructor Description
      HttpConnectionHandler​(java.net.Socket socket, HttpRequestHandler requestHandler)  
      SimpleHttpServer​(int port, HttpRequestHandler requestHandler)  

    • Uses of HttpRequestHandler in net.targetr.httpd.handler

      Classes in net.targetr.httpd.handler that implement HttpRequestHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ClassPathRequestHandler
      Returns binary files accessible on the class path.
      class  FileRequestHandler
      Returns binary files accessible on the file system.

    • Uses of HttpRequestHandler in net.targetr.photoframe.handler

      Classes in net.targetr.photoframe.handler that implement HttpRequestHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AddressHandler
      Returns the private IP address and port the HTTP server is listening to.
      class  DeletePhotoHandler
      Deletes a photo by ID.
      class  NextPhotoHandler
      Uses the PhotoPicker to return photo filenames that should be displayed.
      class  PreviewListHandler  
      class  RootHandler
      The root handler is responsible for reading a request path and delegating to other handlers.
      class  SelectPhotoHandler
      Selects a photo by ID to be displayed by the player.
      class  UploadHandler
      Processes a Base64 encoded blob of JPEG data sent from admin interface.
